K12adhsatpu:3: AśP 1. evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajrādhiṣṭhānasamayajñānavividhaviśeṣasamanvāgataḥ
K12adhsatpu:18: AśP 3. evaṃ pramukhābhir aṣṭābhir bodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K12adhsatpu:19: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanam kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ sarvadharmaviśuddhimukhaṃ brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma //
K12adhsatpu:22: tadyathā (1) surataviśuddhipadam etad yat uta bodhisattvapadam /
K12adhsatpu:44: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaviśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiteti //
K12adhsatpu:46: prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sakṛd api śroṣyati tasyā bodhimaṇḍāt sarvajñeyāvaraṇakleśāvaraṇakarmāvaraṇāni
K12adhsatpu:47: mahānty apy upacinvato na kadācid api narakādyapāyopapattir bhaviṣyati /
K12adhsatpu:48: pāpāni ca kṛtamātrāṇy aduḥkhataḥ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
K12adhsatpu:49: yaś ca dhārayiṣyati dine dine vācayiṣyati svādhyāyiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ihaiva janmani sarvadharmasamatāvajrasamādhipratilambhāt sarvadharmeśvaro bhaviśyati /
K12adhsatpu:51: ṣoḍaśame mahābodhisattvajanmani tathāgatatvaṃ pratilapsyate vajradharatvaṃ ceti //
K12adhsatpu:52: AśP 6. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayaḥ sarvamaṇḍalaḥ sakalavajradhātvagryasattvaḥ
K12adhsatpu:55: udyotayan prahasitavadanas tad ādyaṃ mahāvajram vāmagarvollālanatayā svahṛdyutkarṣaṇayogena
K12adhsatpu:58: AśP 7. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sarvatathāgatavajradharmatābhisaṃbodhinirhāraṃ nāma deśayati sma
K12adhsatpu:63: AśP 8. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imāṃś caturo dharmavihārāñ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvapāpasamācāro 'pi sarvāpāyasamatikrānto bhaviṣyaty ā bodhimaṇḍāt* /
K12adhsatpu:65: AśP 9. athedam uktvā bhagavāñ jñānamuṣṭiparigraha idam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan smitamukha idaṃ sarvadharmasamatāhṛdayam abhāṣata / vajra āḥ //
K12adhsatpu:66: AśP 10. atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayanaśākyamunis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvadharmasamatāvijayasaṅgrahaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānirhāram abhāṣata
K12adhsatpu:71: AśP 11. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K12adhsatpu:72: bhāvayiṣyati tasya traidhātukopapannān api sarvasattvān prapātayato nāpāyagamanaṃ
K12adhsatpu:75: AśP 12. atha vajrapāṇir imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayaṃs trilokavijayavajrāṃ
K12adhsatpu:77: pratyālīḍhasthānastha idaṃ vajrahūṃkāraṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / vajra hūṃ //
K12adhsatpu:78: AśP 13. atha bhagavān svabhāvaviśuddhadharmatāprāptas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvadharmasamatāvalokiteśvarajñānamudraṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
K12adhsatpu:83: AśP 14. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ nayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayisyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvarāgamadhyasthito 'pi padmam iva rāgadoṣair na malair āgantukair lepaṃ yāsyati /
K12adhsatpu:85: AśP 15. atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā
K12adhsatpu:87: idaṃ sarvajagadviśvarūpapadmaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / hrīḥ //
K12adhsatpu:88: AśP 16. atha bhagavān sarvatraidhātukādhipatis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasambhavajñānagarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata
K12adhsatpu:93: AśP 17. athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prahasitavadano bhūtvā svaśirasi vajraratnābhiṣekamālām
K12adhsatpu:94: avabandhayann imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayann idaṃ sarvābhiṣekasamayaratnaṃ
K12adhsatpu:96: AśP 18. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatajñānamudrāprāptaḥ sarvatathāgatamuṣṭidharaḥ sarvatathāgataḥ
K12adhsatpu:97: śāśvataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānamudrādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma prajñāparamitānayārtham abhāṣata /
K12adhsatpu:102: AśP 19. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imam dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty
K12adhsatpu:103: uddeksyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvasiddhīḥ sarvasaṃpattīḥ sarvajñānāni sarvakāryāṇi
K12adhsatpu:107: AśP 20. atha bhagavān vajramuṣṭir mahāsamayavajramudrāparigraha imam evārthaṃ bhūyasyā
K12adhsatpu:108: mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadana idaṃ sarvadṛḍhavajramudrāsiddhisamayaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / aḥ //
K12adhsatpu:109: AśP 21. atha bhagavān sarvadharmasamatāprapañcas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ cakrākṣaraparivartaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
K12adhsatpu:115: AśP 32. ...t* tatra mahāvajreśvara idaṃ tattvahṛdayam agāt* /
K12adhsatpu:117: AśP 33. atha bhagavān anantāparyantaniṣṭhas tathāgato 'paryantāniṣṭhadharmā punar
K12adhsatpu:124: AśP 33*. vajra oṃ sarvadharmatāprapañco hili sarvadharmatā mili sarvānurāgiṇi svāhā //
K12adhsatpu:125: AśP 34. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty
K12adhsatpu:126: uddekṣyati pravartayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati tasyāniṣṭhāṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāṃ gatvā
K12adhsatpu:129: oṃ bhagavann ārāt pāraṃ viśodhaya svāhā //
K12adhsatpu:131: AśP 35. atha sarvatathāgatāḥ samājam āgamyāsya dharmaparyāyasyāmogham apratihatāśusiddhyarthaṃ vajrapāṇaye sādhukāram adāt*
K12adhsatpu:132: sādhu sādhu mahāsattva sādhu sādhu mahāsukha /
K12adhsatpu:133: sādhu sādhu mahāyāna sādhu sādhu mahāmate // 1//
K12adhsatpu:137: adhṛṣṭāś cāghatavyāś ca sarvamārādibhis tu te // 3 //
K12adhsatpu:141: idam uktvā tu sarvāgrāḥ sarvabuddhāḥ sasauraghanāḥ /
K12adhsatpu:143: AśP 37. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyadharmatāprāptaḥ sarvadharmāprapañcaḥ
K12adhsatpu:160: tāvat sattvārtham atulaṃ śaktāḥ kartum anirvṛtāḥ // 6 //
K12adhsatpu:163: rāgādivinayo loka ā bhavāt pāpakṛt sadā /
K12adhsatpu:164: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayanty ā bhavāt svayam // 8 //
K12adhsatpu:165: yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣair na lipyate /
K12adhsatpu:166: vāsadoṣair bhave nityaṃ na lipyante jagaddhitāḥ // 9 //
K12adhsatpu:170: AśP 39. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ paramādyam prajñāpāramitānayamukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K12adhsatpu:171: dine dine kālyam utthāyoccārayiṣyati śroṣyati vā sa sarvasukhasaumanasyalābhī mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayasiddhim
K12adhsatpu:174: AśP 40. atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiṃ guhyakādhipatim āmantrayate sma /
K12adhsatpu:197: oṃ aṃ vaṃ hūṃ oṃ aḥ // 22 //
K12adhsatpu:201: AśP 42. nāyaṃ vajrapāṇe 'navaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati /
K12adhsatpu:202: nāpy anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ śakyo likhituṃ paṭhituṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum* /
K12adhsatpu:203: anyatra bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukham dharmaparyāyam antaśa ekākṣaram api śroṣyanti /
K12adhsatpu:206: satkṛtāni na gurukṛtāni na mānitāni na pūjitāni bhavanti tena na śakyo 'ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukho
K12adhsatpu:208: tasmāc caityabhūtaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
K12adhsatpu:209: vandanīyaś ca sa pudgalo bahukalpakoṭī bhaviṣyati yasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ kāyagato vā pustakagato vā bhaviṣyati /
K12adhsatpu:211: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ kariṣyati /
K12adhsatpu:212: catvāraś cāsya mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye anyāś ca devatāḥ /
K12adhsatpu:215: samāsato yatra buddhakṣetre ākāṅkṣiṣyate tatra tatropapatsyate /
K12adhsatpu:217: api ca pradeśamātraṃ mayā kīrtitam iti //
K12adhsatpu:219: āttamanaso vajrapāṇipramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
